pageTitle: Ludlow Arts Festival 2013 Tickets, Line Up, Festival News and nearby H
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {5294=Disabilities:  They have special arrangements that can be made for wheelchair patrons or patrons with walking difficulties. Toilets for the disabled are within easy reach within the grounds of the Castle. Please call for further information 01584 819005 In the interest of safety and hygiene only Guide Dogs are permitted in the grounds of the Castle.}
textBeforeTable: Ludlow Arts Festival 2013 Hotels Get Directions Travel Map   By Train: Ludlow Train Station is a short walk away from Ludlow Town Centre. There are trains to Shrewsbury for the Midlands and Birmingham, connections at Crewe and Manchester for the North, and connections at  Newport for Bristol and the South West and London and the South East.  Car Parking As well as limited on-street ‘pay and display’ parking there are car parks at Castle Street, Lower Galdeford (Smithfield) and Upper Galdeford (Somerfield). Car parking is not available inside Ludlow Castle. Extra parking available at Ludlow Rugby Club (440 yards from castle)SY8 IEE. By Road: Ludlow is located on the A49. From Birmingham, head west on the A456 through Kidderminster. From the M5 leave at Junction 3 and continue on the A456 through Kidderminster. The Ludlow Arts Festival is held in the grounds of the historic ruins of  Ludlow Castle, one of the finest examples of medieval castles to be found anywhere in the country. The Castle is situated in Ludlow Town, Castle Square, SY8 1AY. Ludlow Arts Festival 2013 Travel Info Jazz Brunch Big Top Tented Theatre The Searchers The Hollies Outdoor Stages
textAfterTable: Ludlow Arts Festival 2013 Video Playlist Outdoor Stages Ludlow Arts Festival 2013 Food and Drink Their performance tent has a spacious bar and refreshment foyer for pre-show and interval drinks.  For outdoor events there will be a large BBQ with their own chef for your use. Please feel free to bring your own meats etc and ask the chef to cook for you. You will find beer tents, wine bars, Hog Roast, hampers from Ludlow Food Centre, and other food outlets in in the grounds of the Castle.        This festival offers.. Latest News
